comment.body: Probably mount and blade, not the best looking game but it helps it run on most systems, such a great game with so much to do making and controlling armys, running kingdoms, fighting first person with a nice first person combat system, highly recommend it.
comment.body_p: Probably mount and blade, not the best looking game but it helps it run on most systems, such a great game with so much to do making and controlling armys, running kingdoms, fighting first person with a nice first person combat system, highly recommend it.
